title: Analysis: America seems set for more uncertainty
description: The election duel between President Donald Trump and Democrat Joe Biden is coming down to counts of hundreds of thousands of legal votes in a handful of key battlegrounds after a night of dramatically shifting fortunes that left a deeply divided America's political fate on a knife edge.

title: America seems set for more uncertainty
An iceberg 80 times the size of Manhattan could destroy a fragile South Atlantic ecosystem
description: One of the world's largest icebergs is on a collision course with a South Atlantic island oasis, potentially threatening a rich ecosystem of wildlife including penguins, seals and krill.

title: Trump's call to halt vote counts is his most brazen swipe at democracy yet
A humpback whale almost swallows kayakers near a California beach
description: Two whale watchers had a close encounter while kayaking off the coast of Avila Beach, California, that they will likely never forget.

title: Crush of mail-in ballots slows count
description: Four key battleground states -- Pennsylvania, Nevada, Michigan and Georgia -- began Wednesday with tens of thousands of absentee ballots uncounted, leaving the White House race between President Donald Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden up in the air.

title: Can Trump decide when to stop counting votes?
description: President Donald Trump declared early Wednesday morning that "we'll be going to the US Supreme Court," and "we want all voting to stop." Trump's statements oversimplify and misconceive how elections work and how the courts function.

title: Marijuana legalized in multiple states
Rescuers fight to reach 5-year-old boy trapped in 200-foot well in India
description: Officials in India's central Madhya Pradesh state are working to rescue a five-year-old boy who fell into a 200-foot well.

title: Fire-ravaged California Wine Country: We're still here
description: The subject of the call was dire: Scattered reports of fire. On the mountain. Maybe headed straight for the Meadowood Napa Valley resort.

title: Vienna attack witnesses describe horror as gunman hit city's 'Bermuda Triangle'
The indie book platform trying to take on Amazon
description: New bookselling platform Bookshop is pitching itself as a way for independent bookstores to claw back sales from Amazon, which controls a lion's share of a market worth nearly $26 billion in the US alone.

title: This is why we don't know the result yet from US election
description: The 2020 election map, at first glance, looks decidedly, well, unfinished.

title: Ethiopia's Nobel laureate leader vows 'military confrontation' with restive region
description: Ethiopia's Nobel Peace Prize-winning Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed has declared a state of emergency in the restive Tigray region in response to an alleged attack by the Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) on a federal military base.

title: Beijing just yanked Ant Group's IPO to show Jack Ma who's really in charge
description: Beijing just showed tech titan Jack Ma and the rest of China's billionaire tycoons who's really in charge.

title: Thai Airways launches 'flight to nowhere' for religious worshippers
description: Nervous travelers have often found themselves praying on board a plane.

title: All the stories you missed while you were focused on Election Day
description: The election is probably dominating your news sources, social feeds and thoughts. But the rest of the world didn't stop on Election Day.

title: Here's why the race in battleground Georgia isn't over
description: CNN's Phil Mattingly and Chris Cuomo walk through how President Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Joe Biden are performing in the battleground state of Georgia as the 2020 presidential election results come in.

title: My body went viral twice. This is how it felt
description: The first time my body went viral, it was a photograph I posted on my Instagram. I'm wearing a blue swimsuit and I'm standing with one hand on my hip striking a pose on the beach in Havana, Cuba. I certainly didn't expect the number of reposts and neither did I expect people commenting in my inbox with words like "Brave," "Inspiring," and "Confident."

title: Majority of voters says Covid has caused them financial hardship, early CNN exit poll shows
News anchors forcefully call out Trump for prematurely declaring victory
description: News anchors forcefully called out President Donald Trump early Wednesday morning after he prematurely declared himself the victor of the 2020 election, despite millions of outstanding ballots left to be counted in several key states.

title: A tale of two campaigns
description: As Donald Trump and Joe Biden campaign for the presidency, their decisions during a global pandemic are on full display.

title: Pennsylvania emerges as early focus of online Election Day misinformation
description: Pennsylvania, which could be critical in determining who wins the presidency, has emerged as an early focus of online misinformation on Election Day, with much of it coming from the right.

title: CNN's Van Jones: I think a lot of Democrats are hurt tonight
description: CNN's Van Jones reacts to results of the 2020 presidential election as final calls remain close in key battleground states.

title: Biden's full speech on election night: Your patience is commendable
description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden makes a statement in Wilmington, Delaware, on the night of the 2020 presidential election.

title: Lindsey Graham delivers acceptance speech
description: Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC) thanks supporters after winning a fourth term to the Senate, defeating Democratic challenger Jaime Harrison.

title: Diego Maradona successfully underwent surgery for a blood clot on the brain, says his doctor
description: Football great Diego Maradona has successfully undergone surgery for a subdural hematoma — more commonly known as a blood clot on the brain — his personal doctor confirmed on Tuesday.

title: Hurricane Eta pummeled northeastern Nicaragua as it made landfall
description: Category 4 Hurricane Eta was pummeling northeastern Nicaragua as its eyewall meandered just offshore Tuesday afternoon, ahead of what could be days of flooding in parts of Central America, the US National Hurricane Center said.

title: US sees the five highest days of Covid-19 cases leading up to election
description: The United States reported the five highest days of Covid-19 cases right up to election, according to data from Johns Hopkins University.

title: Prayers for Kamala Harris in ancestral Indian village, for Trump in Delhi
description: Supporters of US vice presidential candidate Kamala Harris held prayers near her ancestral village in India ahead of Tuesday's US election, while a Hindu fringe group sought divine blessings for her rival Donald Trump.

title: The Electoral College, explained
description: Americans who go to the polls on Election Day don't actually select the President directly.

title: Van Gogh suffered 'delirium' from alcohol withdrawal, experts believe
description: Vincent van Gogh likely suffered from "delirium" caused by alcohol withdrawal, according to a new study of the artist's psychiatric illnesses.

title: Dr. Deborah Birx's stern warning is a wakeup call
description: Dr. Deborah Birx has a dire warning for Americans: The Covid-19 pandemic is going to get much, much worse before it gets any better. And there's one clear takeaway from her warnings: whatever happens on election day, we're largely on our own. It's up to us to keep the number of Covid-19 infections as low as possible as we head into a difficult season that will last far beyond the results of the 2020 election.

title: A 7,600-ton building in China 'walks' to new location
description: Shanghai residents passing through the city's eastern Huangpu district earlier this month might have stumbled upon an unusual sight: a "walking" building.
